name: TYPE (The Young Professional Events)
slogan: Social-networking events for like-minded young professionals
description:
What is the product 
We offer three main event streams, Network, Recharge, Inspire. Each stream is designed to fit seamlessly into the young professional lifestyle. Our team collates quantitative and qualitative feedback to design, deliver and evaluate each event in order to create educated and tailored events.

Our target demographic is not age-specific, but mind-specific. We do not target our members by age, industry or gender but we look for members and event attendees to join our community who realise that their network can be more than just their normal circle and their social media connections. TYPE is the key to unlock their network.

team.name: Tristan Johnson
team.bioHtml: A PPE graduate from Royal Holloway University- A skilled presenter, fast-learner and deal closer with 5 years professional experience in front office Finance.

jobs.title: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) and Co-Founder
jobs.description:
We are looking for an experienced marketing professional or highly astute Marketing graduate to join the team for a soon-to-be funded disrupting start-up in the events sector.

This is an exciting opportunity to be a part of the company from the beginning, and take an equity share of the business.

You will be required to:

1. Have an in-depth knowledge of creating and managing digital marketing campaigns, using DoubleClick or similar, Google tag manager, programmatic or other similar systems.

2. Plan and execute a launch marketing campaign focussing on digital spend.

3. Ensure that the website is correctly set up for tracking and optimisation including content.

4. Optimise the campaign to ensure KPI’s are achieved including the PR messaging.

5. Oversee the creative process for the marketing campaign assets.

Skills Required:

-Ability and foresight to lead a strategy 

-Previous Experience in a pro-active marketing environment

-Must be able to manage time and prioritise

-To meet set and deliver on targets
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are looking for an experienced marketing professional or highly astute Marketing graduate to join the team for a soon-to-be funded disrupting start-up in the events sector.

This is an exciting opportunity to be a part of the company from the beginning, and take an equity share of the business.

You will be required to:

  1. Have an in-depth knowledge of creating and managing digital marketing campaigns, using DoubleClick or similar, Google tag manager, programmatic or other similar systems.

  2. Plan and execute a launch marketing campaign focussing on digital spend.

  3. Ensure that the website is correctly set up for tracking and optimisation including content.

  4. Optimise the campaign to ensure KPI’s are achieved including the PR messaging.

  5. Oversee the creative process for the marketing campaign assets.

Skills Required:

-Ability and foresight to lead a strategy

-Previous Experience in a pro-active marketing environment

-Must be able to manage time and prioritise

-To meet set and deliver on targets
